{{Wireless embedded system |brand=BT |model=Home Hub |revision=3.0B |manuf=Huawei |manuf_model= |availability= |type=wireless router,dsl modem |fcc_id= |ic_id= |pwr_v= |pwr_amp= |pwr_conn= |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM6361 |cpu1_cspeed=400 |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=32 |fla1_brand=STMicroelectronics |fla1_model=NAND256W3ABN6 |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=H5PS5162FFR-S6C |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num=1 |expansion_pcmcia_num= |serial= |jtag= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM6361 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand=Broadcom |eth_chip2_model=B50612E |eth_chip3_brand=Broadcom |eth_chip3_model=B50612E |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags=ADSL2+ |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} *[http://forum.kitz.co.uk/index.php/topic,10161.msg213299.html#msg213299 Internals on '''forum.kitz.co.uk''' posted by ''asbokid''] :(images mirrored below) *"BT-HH3 VER. D" and "08B1-1KC3000" :are silkscreened on the board. :The full part of the CPU is BCM6361EKFEBG. This device is assumed to have two GbE ports
(red WAN port and right most on LAN switch). ==Images== File:Bthh3b board top.jpg|board top File:Bthh3b board bot.jpg|board bottom File:Bthh3b cc.jpg|component closeup File:Bthh3b cpu.jpg|CPU File:Bthh3b ram.jpg|RAM File:Bthh3b flash.jpg|Flash File:Bthh3b phy.jpg|PHYs [[Has images::internal| ]] __NOTOC__
